Name: English Channel
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The earl grey tannins balance the spice and orange in the liqueurs to make a harmonious aperitivo.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at Bellini, Auckland, New Zealand.
Nutrition: One serving of English Channel contains 132 calories
